original_title: David Pieris Group of Companies powered, MCA “E” division 25-Over League Tournament 2024
original_body_lines: The second longest running MCA partnership – the 21st David Pieris Group of Companies powered, MCA “E” division 25-Over League Tournament 2024 contested for the glittering “David Pieris Group of Companies” Challenge Trophy got off to a start on 03rd December, 2023
The participating 18 teams, were pooled into 03 groups, as follows:
Group “A”- Emar Pharma (Pvt) Ltd, John Keells Group “B”, Slim Pharmaceuticals Pvt Ltd, Amana Takaful PLC, Brandix Essentials “A”, and Expo Lanka Freight.
Group “B” – HSBC, Abans Group, PABC Bank, George Steuart Health (Pvt.), LOLC “B” and Teejay Lanka PLC.
Group “C” – Commercial Credit & Finance, Ceylinco Insurance PLC, MAS Silueta, Sanasa Life Insurance PLC, Akbar Brothers (Pvt.) Ltd, and Janashakthi Insurance PLC.
Sanasa Life Insurance will be making their debut at MCA Cricket.
In the previous final that took place on 11th February 2022 at the MCA Grounds, Hayleys Group “B” beat Stafford Motor Co. by 03 runs.
The group stage of the tournament, consisting 45 matches which got under way on 03rd December 2023 will go until 14th January 2024..

The league stage will be followed by the “Knock-Out” stage, consisting 07 matches; the Quarter Finals on 20th January, the Semi Finals on 27th January and the Final on 03rd February- 2024 MCA Grounds.

The selected venues are : MCA, St. Joseph’s College, Darley Road, D.S. Senanayake College Grounds, Dharmapala College, Pannipitiya , NSCA Ratmalana, De Mazanod College, Kandana, Royal College, Colombo, & Prince of Wales – Moratuwa.
